Suzan Bayhan

Associate Professor of Computer Science, University of Twente & Scientific Director of 4TU.NIRICT

Research Interests

  • Wireless networks (5G/6G)
  • Mobile communications (resilience and sustainability)
  • Sustainable ICT
  • Edge-cloud continuum management

Research Team

  • Blas Gomez Mora (Postdoc researcher)
  • Syllas Rangel Magalhaes (Postdoc researcher)
  • Tina Rezaei (PhD candidate, with Andrea Continella and Roland van Rijswijk-Deij)
  • Shyam Krishna Khadka (PhD candidate, with Cristian Hesselman, Ralph Holz)
  • Qianqian Liu (PhD candidate, with Yanqiu Huang, Geert Heijenk)
  • Mehrdad Aslani (PhD candidate, with Marco Gerards)
  • Toni Dimitrovski (PhD candidate, with Geert Heijenk)

Alumni

  • Lotte Weedage, Resilience of Cellular Networks: An analysis of multi-connectivity, beamforming and infrastructure sharing (PhD 2025, currently postdoc@TU/e, supervision: with Clara Stegehuis)
  • Syllas Rangel Magalhaes, Towards More Sustainable Mobile Networks: Is Cooperation the Key? (PhD 2025, currently postdoc@UT, supervision: with Geert Heijenk)

Ongoing Projects

  • 6G Future Network Services (6G FNS), supported by Dutch Ministry of Economic Affairs (National Growth Fund), 2024-2030. [UT website] [project website]
  • MISD: Modular Integrated Sustainable Datacenters, supported by Dutch Ministry of Economic Affairs and Climate, European Important Projects of Common European Interest - Cloud Infrastructure and Services (IPCEI-CIS), 2024-2029. [UT website] [project website].
  • Collaborator: I-CONDA lead by Estefania Coronado [website]

Past Projects

  • Co-PI EERI: Energy-Efficient and Resilient Internet, supported by EEMCS, University of Twente, 2020-2024 [ website] [ video ]
  • PI, DeVid: Leveraging Deep Learning for VIdeo Streaming, supported by German Research Foundation DFG, 2018
  • Researcher, Bright Clouds, Dark Clouds (BCDC), supported by Academy of Finland, 2016
  • Researcher, WiFiUS, Ubiquitous Video over Dynamic Spectrum, supported by Academy of Finland, 2014-2016
  • Researcher, Picking Digital Pockets (PDP), supported by Academy of Finland, 2012-2015
